subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: What looked like a comfortable lead for Emirates Team New Zealand in Race 6 of the America’s Cup turned out to be something much more fragile, and now Alinghi has a 4-2 series lead.
snippet: What looked like a comfortable lead for Emirates Team New Zealand in Race 6 of the America’s Cup turned out to be something much more fragile, and now Alinghi has a 4-2 series lead.
